task.name: h_tsyscal
task.description:
Derive the Tsys calibration for list of ALMA MeasurementSets.
Issues
Output:
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.name: vis
param.description: List of input visibility files. Parameter is not available when pipelinemode='automatic'. example: vis=['ngc5921.ms']

param.name: caltable
param.description: Name of output gain calibration tables. Parameter is not available when pipelinemode='automatic'. example: caltable='ngc5921.gcal'

param.name: chantol
param.shortdescription: Tsys spectral window map channel tolerance
param.description: The tolerance in channels for mapping atmospheric calibration windows (TDM) to science windows (FDM or TDM). example: chantol=5

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In interactive mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or list commands (True)
param.description: Run the task (False) or list commands (True). Parameter is available only when pipelinemode='interactive'.

param.name: acceptresults
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or Parameter is available only when pipelinemode='interactive'.
